description: This module explores the fundamental concepts and principles that underlie techniques for extracting useful information and knowledge from digital communication data. It will focus on introducing technical data skills within both social and societal contexts. Data-analytic thinking will be applied in various ways, including customer relationship management, social media marketing and analysis, data-driven decision making and strategic communication. Students will gain an understanding of the nature of data and its significance for society by learning to view problems from a data perspective, and understanding how to critically analyse such problems.
title: Digital Communications and Analytics
